body_html:
Thank you Edward, and sorry for the silly handling of the issue. It was there in plain sight and it couldn't really have been anything else.

I agree re: refactoring. I'm currently working on #5757, I have capacity to start once that one is done (I'm making progress but I don't have a lot of time this week).

I'll go ahead and open an issue.
